name: Santa Runner (itch) (Delvin Salman)
description:
Click "Space" to jump.

This is an endless runner game, that is styled to be in the theme of Christmas/Santa. This game endlessly runs until an obstacle is hit then the player dies. The goal of this game is to get the best score in reaching further and further. With this comes the factor that the game gets faster as u go, as well as the obstacle, and involves many things like the themed music, style, and ideas. 

CREDITS: All the things you see here are from the web and from tutorials online in the course to create this game. I will leave links to the assets and places I found these.

https://mysterious-krypton-4a0.notion.site/DATT-2300-F22-Game-Design-and-Prototy...

https://www.gameart2d.com/freebies.html

https://www.youtube.com/

https://unity.com/

This game was made for a course DATT 2300.

                                                                                      ***PLEASE CLICK FULL SCREEN TO BETTER PLAY THE GAME!***
